line.text: O how I faint when I of you do write
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Knowing a better spirit doth use your name
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And in the praise thereof spends all his might
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To make me tongue-tied speaking of your fame
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But since your worth (wide as the ocean is)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The humble as the proudest sail doth bear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My saucy bark (inferior far to his)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: On your broad main doth wilfully appear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Your shallowest help will hold me up afloat
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whilst he upon your soundless deep doth ride
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or (being wrecked) I am a worthless boat
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: He of tall building and of goodly pride
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then if he thrive and I be cast away
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The worst was this my love was my decay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
